QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Blackfathom Deeps
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to Blackfathom Deeps, north of Zoram'gar Outpost, immediately!$B$BThe Twilight's Hammer threatens the world with its actions there! If you so choose, head to Blackfathom Deeps and speak with Je'neu Sancrea, a member of the Earthen Ring, to help stop the Twilight threat.
